## ISubprocessOptions interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Details about how the `child_process.ChildProcess` was created.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ISubprocessOptions
```

## Properties

| Property                                                       | Modifiers | Type    | Description                                                                         |
| -------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [detached](./node-core-library.isubprocessoptions.detached.md) |           | boolean | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Whether or not the child process was started in detached mode. |
